name: Legit Fighters
description:
Color corrections made with webgl somehow is not working here.

Computer Ai is made simple without jumping.

Special and Super moves are disabled in this version.

Time is disabled set to infinite.

*Better played with gamepads.

-------

Please report any bugs. The game is still in development. More fighters will be added later.  If this game has gamers approval I will add as many characters and features as posible for a full game. That includes story mode, arcade, versus, training, and extras. 

I'm a solo developer that started this on March 2019. - I wish you have fun. - Johann
